title: Molecularly Engineered, Multifunctional Imide Derivatives for Practical Zn Metal Full Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02867H, Paper
Shengyang Huang, Peng Zhang, Jun Lu, Jun Soo Kim, Dong Hyun Min, Jin Suk Byun, Min Ju Kim, Hao Fu, Peixun Xiong, Pil J. Yoo, Wenwu Li, Yu Xu, Xue Qin, Ho Seok Park
Aqueous zinc metal batteries (ZMBs) are attractive owing to their intrinsic safety and low cost. However, the practical applications are limited by dendrite growth, hydrogen evolution reaction (HER), and corrosion....
